description.brief: OctoMap - A probabilistic, flexible, and compact 3D mapping library for robotic systems.
description.p: The OctoMap library implements a 3D occupancy grid mapping approach, providing data structures and mapping algorithms. The map implementation is based on an octree.
Deprecated. This package now forwards octomap pkgconfig flags through the manifest, do not depend on this feature. Instead use cmake's find_package infrastructure for the octomap package.
More details are available at http://octomap.sourceforge.net/.

package.author: Kai M. Wurm and Armin Hornung
